content.text: Hello, I'm doing well, thank you. How are you doing today?
I'm doing great, thanks! I'm just finished with my education as a registered nurse, and I'm excited to get started on my first full-time job.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll do great. What made you want to be a nurse?
I've always loved helping people, and I think nursing is a great way to do that. I also love the idea of working in a hospital and helping people who are sick or injured.
That's really great. I'm sure you'll be a great nurse.
Thank you! I'm excited to get started.
What was your favorite part of your education?
I think my favorite part was the clinical rotations. I got to put everything I learned in the classroom into practice, and it was really rewarding to help people.
That sounds really great. I'm sure you're going to be a wonderful nurse.
What are your plans for after you graduate?
I'm not sure yet. I'm looking for a job at a hospital, but I'm also open to other opportunities.
I'm sure you'll find something great.
